StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetLSIHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@LsiHistoryID int)
AS
SELECT lh.LSI_HISTORY_ID AS Id ,lh.PERSON_ID AS PersonId ,lh.SPONSOR_NAME AS SponsorName ,lr.RANK AS Rank ,lr.RANK_ID AS RankId ,lsvc.SERVICE AS Service ,lsvc.SERVICE_ID AS ServiceId ,lstat.STATUS AS Status ,lstat.STATUS_ID AS StatusId ,lh.NOTES AS Notes FROM [dbo].[LSI_HISTORY] lh WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN LSI_RANK lr ON lh.RANK_ID = lr.RANK_ID INNER JOIN LSI_SERVICE lsvc ON lh.SERVICE_ID = lsvc.SERVICE_ID INNER JOIN LSI_STATUS lstat ON lh.STATUS_ID = lstat.STATUS_ID WHERE lh.LSI_HISTORY_ID = @LsiHistoryID
